alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:01AM EST until January 10 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .A strong cold front will push across Florida Tuesday and Tuesday night creating tides 1 to 2 feet above normal. This will cause flooding along tidal portions of the Alafia river. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From this evening to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 0.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.5 feet on 06/06/2013. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 0.1 Tue 7 am -0.6 -1.0 -0.7 -0.4 -0.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by midnight EST.
